author: Simon Difford
description: There's a touch of Tiki to this pineapple rum sour that's made distinctive by peppermint and herbal flavours.
name: Barracuda
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
30 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
